document_data.name: Metalmasters' Hall
document_data.owner: [[Most Careful Order of Skilled Smiths & Metalforgers]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Metalmasters' Hall''' was the guildhall of the [[Guilds of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian guild]] known as the [[Most Careful Order of Skilled Smiths & Metalforgers]].<ref>
document_data.Location: The Metalmasters' Hall was located along the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]],
document_data.Structure: This guildhall stood three-stories tall. It was built of [[granite]] in a blockhouse style and one entire end of the building was dominated by a smoky forge.
document_data.Services: A variety of tools and kits could be purchased here.
document_data.Reputation: The Metalmasters' Hall was among some of the more notable and recognizable guildhalls in the Southern Ward. Like other guildhalls in the South Ward, it was considered by locals to be a landmark.
